content: What would be the say to use artefacts from another IG, if that IG is not yet published at the url it will be?
When doing a profile on medication, I want to use a set of example patients. But the patient profile is elsewhere, and not in its final url
as long as it's correctly identified for where it's going to be and published in a package that's a listed dependency, then that will work

I don't follow.
This is the IG with the patients
https://ehealthplatformstandards.github.io/
The patient profile
https://ehealthplatformstandards.github.io/be-patient.profile.html
but the patient profile says the url is
"url" : "https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/StructureDefinition/be-patient",
do you mean that we should align those URLs?
I think that's way to make it work, yes
